message.content:
I need to identify the carrying amount of inventories sold during the reporting period from the financial statement.

Looking at the income statement, I can see the "Cost of Goods Sold" line item, which represents the cost of inventory items that were sold during the period. This is the carrying amount of inventories that were sold during the reporting period.

From the income statement:
- Cost of Goods Sold: 5580000.00

This is the value we're looking for, as it represents the carrying amount of inventories sold during the reporting period.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '5580000.00'} }
```
